author: elecharny
msg: o Reflect the change in Filter that are now Schema aware
o Ignored some tests which wee failing due to DIRSERVER_971. They will be fixed later
o Many small improvment in all the server code (using AT instead of String constants when possible, to avoid useless lookup in AT registry)
o Formatted back some Entry creation in tests

author: jfaath
msg: JUDDI-170, JUDDI-404: adjusting install process for case-folding of keys

author: jfaath
msg: JUDDI-170, JUDDI-404: inquiry, publish, custody transfer and subscription operations automatically case-fold the user input keys

author: elecharny
msg: o Made the Filter Schema aware
